short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Increase video playback speed in Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple tool that allows you to increase playback speed on Disney+ and Prime by 1.5x or 2x speed. Some streaming providers allow increases to playback speed natively, whilst these two major providers do not -- this tool resolves that annoyance

Please suggest, any additional features you would like to see in our future releases.
